pages.title: Page 2: Understanding the AI-Accelerated SDLC
pages.content:
Mentor Overview

Say: â€œEvery software project follows a lifecycle â€” from idea to deployment. Letâ€™s see how AI changes each step.â€

The Traditional SDLC

  1. Requirements gathering (slow meetings, documents)
  2. Design (manual wireframes)
  3. Development (writing thousands of lines manually)
  4. Testing (manual debugging)
  5. Deployment (scripts, setup)

The AI-Powered SDLC

  • ChatGPT generates product ideas and PRDs.
  • V0 creates UI layouts in minutes.
  • Cursor writes and refactors your code in your IDE.
  • Claude explains, optimizes, and debugs large files.
  • Vercel/Railway deploy projects instantly.

â€œWhat took 3 months before, now takes 3 days. The AI Engineer isnâ€™t faster â€” theyâ€™re amplified.â€

Key Outcome: Understand how AI integrates into every stage of the software lifecycle.

pages.title: Page 4: Setting Up Cursor IDE
pages.content:
Mentor Setup

Setup Steps

  1. Go to cursor.sh and download Cursor.
  2. Install and open it.
  3. Sign in with your GitHub account.
  4. In settings, enable:
    - AI Autocomplete
    - Inline Chat
    - Context Awareness

Test the Setup

// Type this in a new file:
// Create a function that checks if a number is prime

function isPrime(n) {
if (n < 2) return false;
for (let i = 2; i <= Math.sqrt(n); i++) {
if (n % i === 0) return false;
}
return true;
}
